column4: How do i make my copy of windows as default boot when using grub? Because linux is at the top when i get into the grub boot selection after a couple of seconds linux will boot because its at the top
im not sure it came with ubuntu 9.10
fresh install of 9.10 or upgrade (it makes a difference)
i think if you edit /etc/default/grub and switch GRUB_DEFAULT=0 to GRUB_DEFAULT=1 then run update-grub it should work
